job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: we are growing rapidly and we are looking for a machine learning engineer to help us analyze data and create and deploy tools utilizing both highlevel ml models and deep learning methods and approaches we leverage these tools to create bots that learn how to navigate and explore mobile apps these bots can be tuned to hunt for os crashessoftware bugs check the app for usability issues or simply learn how to use the app like a normal human user would we are looking for creativethinking ai experts that can help us innovate the world of testing with the latest advances in ailtbrgtltbrgtjob responsibilitiesltbrgtltulgtltligtdesigning new classification models and augmenting classification features that can help improve our existing machine learning
